[vc_row][vc_column]

WHAT WE DO?

OUR SERVICES OVERVIEW

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Combining Freight Forwarding, Customs Brokerage, warehousing and Cargo Space Scheduling,
We provide diverse helping hand

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Freight Forwarding

[vc_column_text]Freight forwarding consists of strategic logistics planning and execution for the international movement of goods, on behalf of shippers. Specifically, a freight forwarder will carry out freight rate negotiations, container tracking, customs documentation, and freight consolidation, among other tasks.

With an expert oversaw group and involvement with this field, our company has earned the trust of numerous corporate customers. We are fit for giving an entire range of spectrum of logistics support Sea Services, Air Services, and Land Services with the adaptability to tailor our services to suit the exact necessity of every individual customer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1488″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1633″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border” css=”.vc_custom_1594387687576{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Custom Brokerage

[vc_column_text]This critical piece of forwarding requires special licensure—a customs brokerage license. Licensed brokers are the only people qualified to manage and submit the extensive documentation necessary to complete importing/exporting processes.

Customs Brokerage plays a crucial role in global movement of goods. Basically, Customs Brokerage firms facilitate the shipment and delivery of goods across geographical borders for individals and organizations.

A customs broker is a specific term used to identify the intermediary between the importer and the government’s customs department in the country of import.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Warehousing

[vc_column_text]Some forwarders may have their own warehouses available
to harbor shippers’ commodities (or parts of commodities), but for the
most part, the service your forwarder will offer is to arrange storage at a
warehouse owned and operated by a conveniently located affiliate.

Warehousing is the process of storing goods which are to be distributed later. A warehouse is defined as any place which is used in the accumulation of goods.

It is important for businesses that import, export, transport and manufacture goods.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1612″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1617″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border” css=”.vc_custom_1594379491151{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Cargo Space Scheduling

[vc_column_text]Savvy coordination and scheduling of cargo space
are the more tangible parts of a forwarder’s skill set. If you hire a freight
forwarder to manage logistics, this is where they’ll have the opportunity to
display their chops. It takes a thoughtful planner to determine whether it is
profitable to consolidate a shipment, to secure timely sailings, and to weigh
the feasibility of intermodal shipping options. Cargo scheduling is the
logistics of “Logistics.

As soon as confirmed export contract is received from the importer, exporter has to try to make the necessary shipping space.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1594384627330{background-image: url(https://transglobeindia.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/background-5291126_1920.jpg?id=1630) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

WE PROVIDE THE BEST

SERVICES
